message.body: Hello, I'm doing well. I'm currently taking a bus to Los Angeles from San Francisco, so the morning was a little busy. How are you?
Have you been to los angeles before?
Are you going for a vacation?
I grew up in los angeles, and my family lives there. My mom went to Armenia so I'm watching my little brothers and sister while she is gone.
That's cool. What part of la are you from?
Do you usually live in the bay area?
I like san francisco too but i liked la better
How long will you be in la?
I visited sf for 2 weeks when i was there. I liked the crooked street
I'm in the greater LA county in a city called Pomona. Which part did you live? I live and like the Bay Area much more than LA.
I used to move around a lot so i lived in santa monica venice arcadia lemert park hollywood westwood and mar vista.
So all the cool parts of LA, I can see why you preferred it more over the bay.
I'm sleepy. I'm going to bed now. Talk to you tomorrow!
